trans-unit.source: Builds the service behavior for the workflow service that it decorates.
trans-unit.target: 为所修饰的工作流服务生成服务行为。

trans-unit.source: The WorkflowServiceAttributes class is used to define service attributes for a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReceiveActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowServiceAttributes 类用于为 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReceiveActivity> 活动定义服务属性。

trans-unit.source: Some of the attributes have default values, as shown below.
trans-unit.target: 某些属性具有默认值，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: Attribute
trans-unit.target: 特性

trans-unit.source: Default Value
trans-unit.target: 默认值

trans-unit.source: AddressFilterMode
trans-unit.target: AddressFilterMode

trans-unit.source: Exact
trans-unit.target: Exact

trans-unit.source: IgnoreExtensionDataObject
trans-unit.target: IgnoreExtensionDataObject

trans-unit.source: False
trans-unit.target: False

trans-unit.source: IncludeExceptionDetailInFault
trans-unit.target: IncludeExceptionDetailInFault

trans-unit.source: False
trans-unit.target: False

trans-unit.source: MaxItemsInObjectGraph
trans-unit.target: MaxItemsInObjectGraph

trans-unit.source: UseSynchronizationContext
trans-unit.target: UseSynchronizationContext

trans-unit.source: True
trans-unit.target: True

trans-unit.source: ValidateMustUnderstand
trans-unit.target: ValidateMustUnderstand

trans-unit.source: True
trans-unit.target: True

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowServiceAttributes" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowServiceAttributes" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is typically called when the parent <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReceiveActivity> activity is created.
trans-unit.target: 当创建父级 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReceiveActivity> 活动时通常会调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowServiceAttributes> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowServiceAttributes> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode" /> enumeration that is used by the dispatcher to route incoming messages to the correct endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置调度程序用于将传入消息路由到正确终结点的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode" /> 枚举。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode" /> enumeration value that is used by the dispatcher to route incoming messages to the correct endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode" /> 枚举值，调度程序使用该值将传入消息路由到正确终结点。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `AddressFilterMode.Exact`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `AddressFilterMode.Exact`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to access the `AddressFilterMode` property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何访问 `AddressFilterMode` 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value used to locate the service element in an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于在应用程序配置文件中定位服务元素的值。

trans-unit.source: The value to locate in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 要在配置文件中查找的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is null.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 null。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to access the `ConfigurationName` property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何访问 `ConfigurationName` 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to send unknown serialization data onto the wire.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否将未知序列化数据发送到网络上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if unknown serialization data is never sent; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果永不发送未知序列化数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to access the `IgnoreExtensionDataObject` property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何访问 `IgnoreExtensionDataObject` 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies that general unhandled execution exceptions are to be converted into a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultException" /> of type <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ExceptionDetail" /> and sent as a fault message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否要将常规未处理执行异常转换为 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultException" /> 类型的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ExceptionDetail" /> 并将其作为错误消息发送。

trans-unit.source: Set this to <see langword="true" /> only during development to troubleshoot a service.
trans-unit.target: 仅在开发阶段将其设置为 <see langword="true" /> 以便对服务进行故障排除。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if unhandled exceptions are to be returned as SOAP faults; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果未经处理的异常将作为 SOAP 错误返回，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to access the `IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults` property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何访问 `IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults` 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of items allowed in a serialized object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置序列化对象中允许的最大项数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items allowed in an object.
trans-unit.target: 对象中允许的最大项数。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to access the `MaxItemsInObjectGraph` property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何访问 `MaxItemsInObjectGraph` 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the name attribute in the service element in Web Services Description Language (WSDL).
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 中服务元素中的名称属性值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Name property.
trans-unit.target: Name 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the <`wsdl:service`> element when exported.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于 <`wsdl:service`> 导出时的元素。

trans-unit.source: The default value is null.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 null。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to access the `Name` property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何访问 `Name` 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the target namespace for the service in Web Services Description Language (WSDL).
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 中服务的目标命名空间值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Namespace property.
trans-unit.target: Namespace 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: This value corresponds to the value of the `targetNamespace` attribute for the <`wsdl:definitions`> element that contains the <`wsdl:service`> element when exported.
trans-unit.target: 此值对应于值`targetNamespace`属性，则为 <`wsdl:definitions`> 元素包含 <`wsdl:service`> 导出时的元素。

trans-unit.source: The default value is null.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 null。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to access the `Namespace` property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何访问 `Namespace` 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to use the current synchronization context to choose the thread of execution.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否使用当前同步上下文来选择执行的线程。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if all calls to the service must run on the thread specified by the <see cref="T:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对服务的所有调用都必须在 <see cref="T:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext" /> 指定的线程上运行，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to access the `UseSynchronizationContext` property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何访问 `UseSynchronizationContext` 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the system or the application enforces SOAP <see langword="MustUnderstand" /> header processing.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是由系统还是由应用程序强制执行 SOAP <see langword="MustUnderstand" /> 标头处理。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the system is to perform SOAP header <see langword="MustUnderstand" /> processing; otherwise <see langword="false" />, which indicates that the application performs this processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果由系统执行 SOAP 标头 <see langword="true" /> 处理，则为 <see langword="MustUnderstand" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />，这表示由应用程序执行此处理。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to access the `ValidateMustUnderstand` property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何访问 `ValidateMustUnderstand` 属性。
